alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:46AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Young, Eastland and Stephens Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 544 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Elbert to near Woodson to 7 miles west of Moran to Oplin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graham, Breckenridge, Eastland, Cisco, Olney, Ranger, Rising Star, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Lake Cisco, Lake Daniel, Gunsight, Lake Graham, Necessity, Lake Olden, Caddo, Crystal Falls, Lake Leon, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Possum Kingdom Lake and Newcastle. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 354. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
